definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-

sentences.english: The most successful of the winners is Du Jian, who is now an international supermodel.
sentences.chinese: 最成功的冠軍是杜鵑，她現在已經是國際超模了。

sentences.english: Just why is it that he dates all of those supermodels?
sentences.chinese: 只不過想問問，他爲什麼就與那些超模約會？

sentences.english: They may not be supermodels, but they like to look like models.
sentences.chinese: 她們不一定是超模但她們喜歡看起來像個模特。

sentences.english: Some supermodels are far too skinny.
sentences.chinese: 有些超模實在是過於瘦了。

sentences.english: In 1997, she received the VH1 award for Supermodel of the Year.
sentences.chinese: 1997年，泰拉獲得“音樂電視臺年度超模獎”。

sentences.english: Taylor denies having given diamonds to the supermodel.
sentences.chinese: 泰勒否認曾給這個超模送過鑽石。

sentences.english: Not even supermodels think they are perfect.
sentences.chinese: 甚至是超模都不會覺得他們的身材是完美的。

sentences.english: What do you look like when you’re not in your super model mode?
sentences.chinese: 在沒有開啓“超模模式”時，你是什麼樣子的？

definition: a fashion show/to walk the runway (in a fashion show)
Matou town in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
